title: [Large-scale] Social Studies Instructional Design Utilizing Learning Object Reuse Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device operation skills and foundational social studies knowledge
context.additional_context: A social studies re-education program for adult learners in corporate settings, conducted through activity-based learning in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can design a content classification system with three types by analyzing reusable learning object structures (metadata, modularization)
Learners can implement linear/networked learning object sequencing strategies for social studies topics in two case-specific examples
Learners can verify reusable learning objects by distinguishing granularity levels (unit-topic-activity) against a five-criterion evaluation framework

resources: Three Types of Social Studies Standard Learning Object Templates

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
